title: Hour 3 - Bob Uecker (06-26-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bob Uecker (06-26-20)
description:
Bob Uecker is all set to broadcast his 50th season with the Brewers. Bob tells Dan that it is actually his 65th year total being involved with baseball. Bob tells Dan about his days of performing on the Carson show and how the band from the show used to come over and sit with him in the broadcast booth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bob Uecker is all set to broadcast his 50th season with the Brewers. Bob tells Dan that it is actually his 65th year total being involved with baseball. Bob tells Dan about his days of performing on the Carson show and how the band from the show used to come over and sit with him in the broadcast booth.
